ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Set out with My slaves by night. You will certainly be pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Journey by night with My devotees," (it was said); "you will certainly be pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (He was told): “Set out with My servants by night for you will certainly be pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We told him, "Leave the city with My servants during the night. You will be pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We commanded him, “Journey with My bondmen in a part of the night – you will be pursued.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Allah said): "Depart you with My servants by night. Surely, you will be pursued."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So go forth with My servants by night; surely you will be pursued:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then set thou forth with My servants in a watch of the night; surely you will be followed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then (his Lord commanded): Take away My slaves by night. Lo! ye will be followed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God said, "Set out with My servants by night, for you will certainly be pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So depart thou with My bondmen by night; verily ye shall be pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [Allah told him,] ‘Set out by night with My servants; for you will be pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (The reply came:) "March forth with My Servants by night: for ye are sure to be pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah said): "Depart you with My slaves by night. Surely, you will be pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (His Lord answered): 'Set out with My worshipers in the night, for you will surely be followed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Set out with My servants by night—you will be followed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah said], "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:23] God, exalted be He, said: ‘Then set out (read fa-asri or fa’sri) with My servants, the Children of Israel, by night; for you will assuredly be pursued, [surely] Pharaoh and his people will pursue you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then (his Lord commanded) Take away my slaves by night) Allah said to Moses: "take away My slaves, the Children of Israel at the beginning of the night". (Lo! ye will be followed) to the sea,
